name: Wood Herald
description: The Wood Herald is a small plant creature embodying nature's essence, with a form that blends seamlessly into the foliage of the woods. It has a trunk-like body, twigs for limbs, and a wooden greataxe.
memorable: Its Plant Camouflage ability makes it exceptionally stealthy in natural environments while its Brambly Bark reaction punishes melee attackers.
goals: To protect the woods and maintain balance in natural ecosystems.
relations: Often found in proximity to other nature-oriented creatures and guardians.
environment: Typically inhabits forest or wooded areas with abundant plant life.
strengths: High stealth capabilities in forested areas and resistance to various debilitating conditions.
weaknesses: Limited speed and maneuverability outside of natural environments.
attacks: Engages with a wooden greataxe for slashing damage or hurls thorns for piercing damage, alongside its powerful slam attack.
most_powerful_ability: Plant Camouflage allows for exceptional stealth in foliage, while Brambly Bark provides retaliation against attackers.
equipment: Wields a wooden greataxe for melee combat.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light and darkness.
skills: Has a Stealth skill of 13, making it capable of effective maneuvering in natural surroundings.
additional_information: Resistant to exhaustion and several debilitating conditions
Moves through nonmagical plants without penalty
Can strike with both melee and ranged attacks
Acts as a guardian of the woods
test_queries: small plant guardian of the woods
plant creature that punishes melee attackers
stealthy guardian with a wooden greataxe
